pr_title: add auxiliary header directly for cross tenant

timeline.message: remove error body check for cross tenant

timeline.bodyText: For DeploymentFailed, the LINKED_AUTHORIZATION_FAILED could be found via cloudError.details().get(index).code(). It would be better to traverse inside details() if the code() is not LINKED_AUTHORIZATION_FAILED, instead of deleting the check logic directly.
timeline.author: xseeseesee

replies.bodyText: LINKED_AUTHORIZATION_FAILED needs to parse details().get(index).message(), rather than in code()
replies.author: ChenTanyi

replies.bodyText: The problem maybe is how much we can trust service error message and its detail, and whether service might change it in future, without our knowledge. Hence it probably much safer to just go with the auxiliary if it is provided.
replies.author: weidongxu-microsoft

timeline.message: remove failing check, will always auth with auxiliary
add check for token credential length
